org.jcvi.jillion.assembly

Interface Scaffold

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultScaffold

    public interface Scaffold
    A scaffold (also known as a super-contig) is a layout of Contigs placed and oriented together such that it can be determined the distance and orientation between contigs. Scaffold usually do not contain overlapping contigs so therefore often have gaps where there is no genomic data.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Get the id of this scaffold.
        Returns:
        the id of this scaffold; never null.

      • getPlacedContig

        PlacedContig getPlacedContig(String contigId)
        Get the PlacedContig representation for the given contig id.
        Parameters:
        contigId - the id of the contig to get.
        Returns:
        a PlacedContig object if it exsits; null if it does not exist in the scaffold.

      • hasContig

        boolean hasContig(String contigId)
        Does this scaffold contain a PlacedContig object with the given contig id?
        Parameters:
        contigId - the contig id to check.
        Returns:
        true if the contig is in the scaffold; false otherwise.

      • getPlacedContigs

        Set<PlacedContig> getPlacedContigs()
        Get a set of all the PlacedContigs in this scaffold.
        Returns:
        a Set of PlacedContigs; will never be null and will only be empty if there are no contigs in this scaffold.

      • getContigCoverageMap

        CoverageMap<PlacedContig> getContigCoverageMap()
        Get the CoverageMap of the PlacedContigs in this scaffold.
        Returns:
        a CoverageMap; never null.

      • getNumberOfContigs

        int getNumberOfContigs()
        Get the number of contigs in this scaffold.
        Returns:
        a positive number.

      • getLength

        long getLength()
        Get the length of this scaffold in ungapped bases.
        Returns:
        the length of this scaffold.

      • convertContigRangeToScaffoldRange

        Range convertContigRangeToScaffoldRange(String placedContigId,
                                        Range placedContigRange)
        Converts contig based coordinates into scaffold coordinates.
        Parameters:
        placedContigId - the id of the contig to use.
        placedContigRange - the Range on this contig to convert.
        Returns:
        The Range of the input placedContigRange converted into the coordinate system of the scaffold.

      • getContigIds

        Iterator<String> getContigIds()
        Get an iterator of all the contig ids in this scaffold.
        Returns:
        an iterator of the contig ids; never null.
